short_summary: Site Operations Kapuskasing Automated Radiosonde Observing System
description: Environment and Climate Change Canada has a requirement for a Contractor to provide service and preventative maintenance to the Vaisala Automated Radiosonde Observing System located in Kapuskasing, Ontario. The Work is to be performed during the period of August 1, 2024 to July 31, 2026 plus 3 option year period of one year. The selection will be based on the highest responsive combined rating of technical merit and price. The ratio will be 70% for the technical merit and 30% for the price.

full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Site Operations Kapuskasing Automated Radiosonde Observing System

### Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: `5000077134`
* Tender Title: `Site Operations Kapuskasing Automated Radiosonde Observing System`
* Tender Closing Date: `2024-06-14T14:00:00`
* Expected Contract Start Date: `2024-08-01`
* Expected Contract End Date: `2026-07-31`

### Tender Description

Environment and Climate Change Canada invites eligible contractors to submit a proposal for site operations maintenance and preventative maintenance services for the Automated Radiosonde Observing System (AROS) located in Kapuskasing, Ontario.

The scope of work includes:

* Maintenance and repair of AROS instrumentation, software, and associated infrastructure
* Conducting routine site visits and reporting any system issues or anomalies
* Collaborating with Environment and Climate Change Canada staff to ensure smooth system operation

### Security Requirements

This tender is subject to security requirements, which are outlined in Parts 6 and 7 of the bid solicitation. Bidders are required to have adequate security measures in place to protect sensitive information and comply with relevant security standards.

### Trade Agreements and Social Procurement

* This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement and other international trade agreements.
* Environment and Climate Change Canada encourages bidders from under-represented groups, including women, LGBTQ2+ persons, persons with disabilities, and persons from visible minorities, to submit a bid.

### Tender Evaluation

Proposals will be evaluated on a combined basis of technical merit and price, with a weighted ratio of 70% for technical merit and 30% for price.

### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: `2024-06-14T14:00:00`
* Expected contract start date: `2024-08-01`
* Expected contract end date: `2026-07-31`

### Contact Information

To obtain more information or request a debriefing on the bid solicitation process, please contact the following individual:

* Ashley Cartier
* ashley.cartier@ec.gc.ca
* Phone: 873800-4778

### Documentation

The tender documents, including the bid solicitation, tender package, and annexes, can be downloaded from the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37867/5000077134_en_rfp_amd
